skills.title: Skills
skills.text: I focus on Web App Development and have a strong background in Computer Science. I create user-friendly web solutions with skills in both front-end and back-end development.

about.title: About Me
about.text: I am a dedicated Full Stack Developer specializing in Node.js and Vue.js, with additional experience in Python. With a passion for building efficient and scalable web applications, I thrive in dynamic environments and enjoy tackling new challenges. My strong problem-solving skills and collaborative approach make me an asset to any development team. I am committed to continuous learning and staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends to deliver top-notch solutions.
